name: Ultimate Pixel Combat
description:
This game is a street-fighter type game but different because you have all sorts of events that can happen during the fight. You can play against the AI or you can use two controllers so you can play it with your friends at home.

There are three different characters in the game:

  • Yamoto the ninja
  • Smith the soldier
  • Data the robot

You can choose one of these three warriors to be your hero. The characters can slide, jump and attack. When you're attacking, you can get combo's so you can hit the opponent with more damage. AWESOME!!!

While you're playing the game, there will be some random loot dropping from the sky that you can pick up to gain or lose health. There are (for now) six different items:

  • Health orbs
  • Health canisters (white)
  • Health canisters (red)
  • Spikes
  • Caltrops
  • Landmines

Have fun fighting!!

(This game is still in development so if you find any bugs please contact me or comment on this game)
